Posts.Content: srichards wrote: I desperatley need some positive stories or information from anyone with MBC. In September I was diagnosed with stage IV BC with a liver met. I have completed 6 rounds of chemo taxotere with herceptin and perjeta and I will have lumpectomy, liver resection and nodes surgery next week and herceptin, perjeta and tamoxifen from now until ??? I'm 47. I'm honestly not sure how long I should expect to live. I see so many various stats and figures. I hear that Herceptin and Perjeta are game changers and much of the prognosis info out there doesnt take newer therapies into account. Would love to hear your thoughts/ stories etc. Suzi Dx 9/29/2016, IDC: Mucinous, Right, 2cm, Stage IV, metastasized to liver, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Targeted Therapy 9/30/2016 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy 10/1/2016 Taxotere (docetaxel) Hormonal Therapy Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Surgery Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Log in to post a reply
